Go There & Back Dave & LeeAnne Travel the World in 2007

Passage to Mumbai

14 Mar 2007 | Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

So we’re getting on a plane bound for India this afternoon, and we’re full of excitement and anticipation. We’re also sadly saying good-bye to things like clean tap water, salads and the ubiquitous first world flush toilet. C’est la vie.

We’re saying hello to a country in the midst of World Cup (of Cricket) frenzy. Do you know who the Captain of the India National team is? Neither do we. But I’m sure we will learn. More to come.

— David Hogge
